name: mutinously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you refuse or are not willing to do what you are told to do: They grumbled mutinously about the work. "I'm not hungry," he said mutinously.
More examplesFewer examples"I hate being bossed around," she muttered mutinously.The ten-year-old was looking at her mutinously.She glared mutinously at him.Some of the children looked mutinously distrustful.
